text:
"Extremes" is the third studio album released by American country music artist Collin Raye. "Extremes" became platinum in the United States for sales of over one million copies. The singles released from this album were "That's My Story", "Man of My Word", "My Kind of Girl", "If I Were You" and "Little Rock". "My Kind of Girl" was a Number One hit on the Hot Country Songs charts. The other singles all reached Top Ten.
"Dreaming My Dreams with You" is a cover of the Waylon Jennings song. "A Bible and a Bus Ticket Home" was later recorded by Confederate Railroad on their album "Keep On Rockin.
